metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4255 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description:
(An out-of-bounds write issue has been discovered in the backspace hand...)

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-4255` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

w3m - 0.5.3+git20210102-6ubuntu0.2
w3m-img - 0.5.3+git20210102-6ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: w3m package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.5.3+git20210102-6ubuntu0.2').
